prompt.description: The text prompt describing the content, style, or composition of the image to be generated.

num_images.description: The number of images to generate.

seed.description: The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model will output the same image every time.

guidance_scale.description: The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale is a measure of how close you want the model to stick to your prompt when looking for a related image to show you.

safety_tolerance.description: The safety tolerance level for the generated image. 1 being the most strict and 5 being the most permissive.

output_format.description: The format of the generated image.

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated image.

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.

b64_json.description: The base64-encoded JSON of the generated image.

tokens_used.description: The number of tokens consumed during generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -L \
  --request POST \
  --url 'https://api.aimlapi.com/v1/images/generations' \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>' \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
    "model": "flux/kontext-max/text-to-image",
    "prompt": "A T-Rex relaxing on a beach, lying on a sun lounger and wearing sunglasses."
  }'

POST /v1/images/generations HTTP/1.1
Host: api.aimlapi.com
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR_AIMLAPI_KEY>
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: */*

{
  "model": "flux/kontext-max/text-to-image",
  "prompt": "A T-Rex relaxing on a beach, lying on a sun lounger and wearing sunglasses."
}
